Detailed Description

Request a map from the MapServer.

moduletype_t  moduletype,
Cache *  cache
) 
 

Creates a request who owns and uses a existing MapRequestPacket.

Parameters:
reqID is a unique requestid.
p is the MapRequestacket to send.
cache is the Cache to use, default NULL.
moduletype optional parameter to specify the module to send to.
